formulas.name: Action Roll (1d6 + adds)
formulas.description: STARFORGED: Roll your action die and add stat/bonus. Compare vs two challenge dice (below).

formulas.name: Challenge Dice (2d10)
formulas.description: Roll two d10 challenge dice. Compare each to your action total: beat both=Strong Hit; beat one=Weak Hit; beat none=Miss.

formulas.name: Progress Move (2d10)
formulas.description: Roll two d10 challenge dice; compare each to your current progress value (0â€“10).
